page.title: 11Industry In Hall Green
page.content: On 19th June 1985 Mr.Breakwell the manager of Hall Green Group was interveiwed. He said that the factory in Beach Veiw Hall Green was established in 1966 and he has owned it ever since.THe factory covers 1600 square feet.He employs fourteen people full time and twenty five people part time.His workers work five days a week with a half hour dinner break.He employs workers between the ages of seventeen and seventy.The workers pack greeting cards.In addition Mr. Breakwell sells gift wraps, envelopes, tape,stationary,computer supplies, paper bags and plain adhesive.He has one machine which covers greetings cards with plastic cellophane the products are sent all round the British Isles.
